name: Acid Mages of the Infinite Tower
name_original: Acid Mages of the Infinite Tower
description:
Beyond Skull Mountain and the Demon Wastes, countless other worlds exist. The Acid Mages roam the multiverse, using the Infinite Tower to convey them along their path towards their personal Grail.

A spiritual sequel to METAL QUEENS OV SKULL MOUNTAIN, capturing 70s psychedelia and prog rock in tabletop RPG form the same way the former game captured classic heavy metal. Call forth your Astral Prisms, craft your spells, and discover what awaits you in the Infinite Tower.
